mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Moore, Andrew
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Poplar, Crawford Co., Ohio [Poplar, Crawford County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Moore, Andrew Patient Age: 18. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot wound left thigh near New Market VA. Location Wounded: In action near New Market, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/05/15. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Result: Cured and returned to duty.
